title: Internet has gotten really bad lately
body:
Recently my internet has gotten really bad. But this only effects league, i've tried everything except Ethernet(i can't) but nothing seems to work. I've spent a lot of time and money on this game and would not like it to go to waste.

Please help!

LogsofLag: http://logsoflag.com/#NmBH2RT8nfo

P.S. After  Riots servers were moved to Chicago my ping was 25 avg and now without lag my avg is 40

replies.body:
Your *logsoflag* report shows you may be experiencing these issues due to *Packet Loss*. This could be caused by an issue on your local network, your network adapter, or a problem with your network routing to our servers. As a start, I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings have been properly configured for League.

If you encounter further issues with this, please let me know.
